Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a painting of a glowing bat

On a background of a midnight blue sky with yellowish stars sprinkled here and there you see the silhouette of a tiny, slender bat. You know this from the light-laced wings spread out behind her feminine form, lending a soft sparkle that illuminates her immediate surroundings, and the large ears perched atop her head. Standing straight, as if it would give height to her naturally small body, she angles her heart-shaped face in the direction of the sliver of a moon casting a meagre shine from the sky. A joyous smile curves her pink rosebud lips and a similar shine emanates from her owlish eyes. Particular attention has been paid here, capturing a light glint in silvery taupe eyes that are heavily shaded with caliginous black eyelashes. She is clad in what appears to be a matching ensemble of caliginous black short skirt and boots, with pink lace tights, silvery taupe bodice and mushroom white blouse. A bronzed green healers bag slung from a slender shoulder is tucked in the background so as not to detract from the figure in the foreground.

On a background of a midnight blue sky with yellowish stars sprinkled here and there you see the silhouette of a tiny, slender bat. You know this from the light-laced wings spread out behind her feminine form, lending a soft sparkle that illuminates her immediate surroundings, and the large ears perched atop her head.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "signed with a simple 'SG' in the lower right corner, and is of superb quality."
